body.name: SOUNDANCE Acrylic Laptop Stand for Desk, Ergonomic Computer Riser Elevator, Stable Laptop Cooling Holder Compatible with 10 to 15.6 Inches Notebook Computer, Clear Transparent (Transparent)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 15 hrs 16 mins
features: Enhanced Stability - Worry less about wobbling and more about typing with our upgraded support design that provides optimal stability. Rubber pads and hooks on both sides stabilize your laptop and prevent slipping and scratching, while the bottom of the stand increases stability and prevents shaking.

Stylish and Functional - Our laptop stand is made from thick, clear acrylic material that not only looks sleek but also helps keep your workspace clutter-free. The triangular support design offers ultimate stability, and the tilt makes wrist typing comfortable. Get ready to improve your posture, productivity and comfort!

Optimal Cooling - Our ventilated stand promotes better airflow to prevent overheating. Use the laptop cooling stand to extend the life of your notebook without the need for an electric cooling fan, and work comfortably for long hours.
Easy to Assemble - It is easy to assemble and disassemble our laptop riser.

Universal Compatibility - Designed for laptops ranging from 10 to 15.6 inches, including popular sizes like 13 inches, 14 inches, and 15.6 inches. *Please note it's not suitable for 15"-17.3" Surfacebook.
body.description: Providing superior stability compared to other stands, you can type away comfortably without worrying about any wobbling. With its sleek and minimalist design, our laptop stand is not only functional but also adds a touch of style to any home or office decor. Made from thicken clear acrylic material, the clear color accentuates any environment. Better yet, our ventilated stand enhances cooling, allowing greater air flow to prevent your laptop from overheating. Perhaps the most convenient feature is how easily our laptop riser can be assembled and disassembled into three separate parts, making it a breeze to transport or store it away. Our laptop stand is perfect for laptops ranging from 10 to 15.6 inches, including popular sizes like 13 inches, 14 inches, and 15.6 inches. Please be aware, however, that it's not suitable for 15"-17.3" Surfacebook. Upgrade your workspace with our universal compatibility laptop stand, providing a clear view for the perfect angle and a comfortable typing experience that adapts to your needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and works!
reviews.reviewText: This little stand came together in literally 2 snaps! So easy. I like that it's clear and unobtrusive.Fits my MacBook Pro and MacBook Air and the angle is comfortable to work on. It also keeps my head up while I'm working so my neck feels better after a long stint at the key board. (MacBook Air is in the photo.)My MacBook Pro can get very hot and this was a great solution to get air flow under it while working at the table.This little stand came with foam pads, but I didn't need them. Don't want to try to take it apart now, but if it comes apart easily I'll pack it in my briefcase when I travel.Simple and visually "clutter free" solution that's all upside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent, low elevation, a bit squeaky
reviews.reviewText: This is very easy to put together and it's nice to raise the laptop a little. I mostly wanted this for zoom calls, where having the laptop below head level does not make for a very flattering view. This only raises the laptop a couple of inches, so not a big difference, but when put on a book or two, does the trick. If your goal is to just get some clearance for heat venting, it would work well for that. The plastic itself is pretty thick and not likely to break, but the connection between the pieces feels a little flimsy. I'm not really worried about it falling apart, although it probably wouldn't take a lot of pressure to snap it. But since there's a little wiggle room in the connections, it squeaks a bit as you move it around, kind of like the sound of a styrofoam ice chest in the back of a car, that plastic friction squeak. But it only makes that sound when you move it around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Assemble. Limited Height. Cannot Adjust.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This laptop stand is just OK. It is sturdy once you snap it together, so I’m not worried about that, but it does creak a little when you move your laptop and you can’t adjust the height. I have other metal stands that I prefer, as they sit a bit higher, I can adjust them, and I can actually put a pen underneath them or a notepad to clear space on my desktop. Rubber stick on pads come with it, so I put some underneath to keep it from sliding around, and one on each of the top brackets so my laptop kind of sticks. This one is functional, but for the price I would look for a metal one that’s adjustable and sits higher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and modern
reviews.reviewText: This is exactly what I have been looking for! I needed a portable, easy to manage stand for my lap top for meetings so that the camera is up higher and to help keep my laptop cool. I use a podcast program which heats up my laptop fast - this is no longer an issue.The stand was very easy to assemble and came with rubber pads to help stabilize the stand. I like the sleek modern look of the clear acrylic stand and that I can easily pack it for an upcoming trip. This stand is simple and light weight. I have. metal stand that I can't travel with and is quite heavy and cumbersome, this little stand is a dream!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: When I opened the box, I was like, what? This is it? It's 3 very lightweight pieces (about 1/8" thick") that snap together - a back bar and two angled feet that hold the laptop. But it works, and it's stable. It lifts my screen exactly 3", which helps with my spine condition so I'm not looking downward as much. And the keyboard is still easy to type with (maybe a little easier actually because I can see it better), so I don't need a separate one. I'm happy with it. With the coupon, I would give it 5 stars because it's a good value then as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Piece of junk.
reviews.reviewText: This stand broke within three days of my having it, so I only got to try the stand once. The assembly was simple enough, but unpleasant as the plastic made a horrific noise as it slid against itself to fit into place. The stand held my computer just fine, but I can't tell if it actually helped prevent it from overheating or not. The fans still kicked on after a few hours' use.If you need a computer stand, I'd recommend getting one that requires no assembly, or at the least has stronger joints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect! - Keeps laptop cool and keeps my wrists from hurting
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this because I have a laptop connected to a VR headset that was sitting flat and needed some added ventilation. I didn't use the laptop much because it was also awkward to type on it due to the way it was sitting flat. The rest helped put the laptop in a position where I can use it now to browse the internet while I'm watching TV instead of using my phone which requires me to constantly put on and take off my reading glasses. I may even use this while traveling because it breaks down into three pieces that would be easy to place in my carry on. Great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Clear Winner for Improved Ergonomics
reviews.reviewText: I've been on the hunt for a laptop stand that checks all the right boxes, and the SOUNDANCE Acrylic Laptop Stand certainly does the trick. This transparent riser elevates my laptop to just the right height, making long hours at my desk a lot more comfortable. The ergonomic design not only promotes better posture but also aids in cooling, ensuring my laptop stays at an optimal temperature during heavy use.One standout feature is the clear, transparent design, which seamlessly blends into any workspace. It's sturdy and supports laptops ranging from 10 to 15.6 inches with ease. However, I did notice that the surface can accumulate smudges and fingerprints over time, so regular cleaning is necessary to maintain its pristine look. Overall, this laptop stand is a smart investment for anyone looking to enhance their workspace ergonomics and keep their laptop running smoothly. It's a clear win in my book.
